document.full_text: wouter weylandt's leopard trek team mates pulled out of the giro d'italia on tuesday after taking part in a "stage of respect" for the belgian rider who was killed in a crash.
document.title: leopard pull out of giro after weylandt's death
lines_and_colors: wouter weylandt's leopard trek team mates pulled out of the giro d'italia on tuesday after taking part in a "stage of respect" for the belgian rider who was killed in a crash.
